headline: This Powerful Cartoon About The Charlie Hebdo Attack Is Not By Banksy
content: It's by London-based French illustrator Lucille Clerc.BuzzFeed News Reporter, UKHowever, it's by illustrator Lucille Clerc. You can see more of her work here.BuzzFeed was also one of several media outlets to mistakenly credit the image to Banksy. A correction has now been issued.Alan White is a news editor for BuzzFeed News and is based in London. Contact Alan White at alan.white@buzzfeed.com.Got a confidential tip? Submit it here
